data.title: Profiles of the Belgian Royal Family
data.meta_description: For more information about the Royal Family of Belgium, past and present see Unofficial Royalty: Belgian Index. Unless otherwise noted, all photos below are from Wikipedia. King Philippe Queen Math…
data.text:
For more information about the Royal Family of Belgium, past and present see Unofficial Royalty: Belgian Index. Unless otherwise noted, all photos below are from Wikipedia.

King Philippe

Queen Mathilde

King Albert II

Queen Paola

Princess Elisabeth, The Duchess of Brabant

Prince Gabriel

Prince Emmanuel

Princess Eléonore

Princess Astrid, Archduchess of Austria-Este

Prince Lorenz, Archduke of Austria-Este

Prince Laurent

Princess Claire

King Philippe

Full Name: Philippe Léopold Louis Marie

Title: His Majesty The King of the Belgians

Reign: July 21, 2013 – present

Born: April 15, 1960 at Château de Belvédère in Laeken, Belgium

Parents: King Albert II of the Belgians and Paola Ruffo di Calabria

Married: Mathilde d’Udekem d’Acoz on December 4, 1999 at the Cathedral of Saints Michael and Gudula in Brussels, Belgium

Children:

-Princess Elisabeth, The Duchess of Brabant, born October 25, 2001

-Prince Gabriel, born August 20, 2003

-Prince Emmanuel born October 4, 2005

-Princess Eléonore born April 16, 2008

Education:

– Royal Military Academy of Belgium in Brussels, Belgium, graduated in 1981

– Trinity College, Oxford University in Oxford, England

– Graduate School of Stanford University in Stanford, California, USA, Master of Arts degree in political science

Links:

Unofficial Royalty: King Philippe of Belgium

Belgian Monarchy: King Philippe

Wikipedia: Philippe, King of the Belgians

Queen Mathilde

Full Name: Mathilde Marie Christiane Ghislaine d’Udekem d’Acoz

Title: Her Majesty The Queen of the Belgians

Born: January 20, 1973 in Uccle, Belgium

Parents: Count Patrick d’Udekem d’Acoz and Countess Anna Maria Komorowska

Married: Prince Philippe of Belgium on December 4, 1999 at the Cathedral of Saints Michael and Gudula in Brussels, Belgium

Children:

-Princess Elisabeth, The Duchess of Brabant, born October 25, 2001

-Prince Gabriel, born August 20, 2003

-Prince Emmanuel born October 4, 2005

-Princess Eléonore born April 16, 2008

Education:

– Secondary Education: Institut de la Vierge Fidèle in Brussels, Belgium

– 1991-1994: Institut Libre Marie Haps in Brussels, diploma in speech therapy with “grande distinction”

– Université catholique de Louvain, diploma in psychology with “distinction” in 2002

Links:

Unofficial Royalty: Queen Mathilde of Belgium

Belgian Monarchy: Queen Mathilde

Wikipedia: Queen Mathilde of Belgium

King Albert II

Full Name: Albert Félix Humbert Théodore Christian Eugène Marie

Title: His Majesty King Albert II

Reign: August 9, 1993 – July 21, 2013

Born: June 6, 1934 at Stuyvenberg Castle in Brussels, Belgium

Parents: King Leopold III and Princess Astrid of Sweden

Married: Paola, Princess Ruffo di Calabria on July 2, 1959 at the Collegiate Church of Saints Michael and Gudula in Brussels

Children:

-HM King Philippe, born April 15, 1960

-HRH Princess Astrid, born June 5, 1962

-HRH Prince Laurent, born October 19, 1963

Education:

Privately educated during World War II

Institut Le Rosey in Rolle, Switzerland

Links:

Unofficial Royalty: King Albert II of Belgium

Belgian Monarchy: King Albert II

Wikipedia: King Albert of Belgium

Queen Paola

Full Name: Donna Paola Margherita Maria Antonia Consiglia, Princess Ruffo di Calabria

Title: Her Majesty Queen Paola

Born: September 11, 1937

Parents: Fulco, Prince Ruffo di Calabria, 6th Duke of Guardia Lombarda and Countess Luisa Gazelli di Rossana e di Sebastiano

Married: King Albert II on July 2, 1959 at the Collegiate Church of Saints Michael and Gudula in Brussels

Children:

-HM King Philippe, born April 15, 1960

-HRH Princess Astrid, born June 5, 1962

-HRH Prince Laurent, born October 19, 1963

Education:

Classical secondary education in Latin and Greek in Rome, Italy

Links:

Unofficial Royalty: Queen Paola of Belgium

Belgian Monarchy: Queen Paola

Wikipedia: Queen Paola of Belgium

Princess Elisabeth, The Duchess of Brabant

Full Name: Élisabeth Thérèse Marie Hélène

Title: Her Royal Highness Princess Élisabeth of Belgium, The Duchess of Brabant

Born: October 25, 2001 at the Erasmus Hospital in Anderlecht, Brussels

Parents: King Philippe of the Belgians and Mathilde d’Udekem d’Acoz

Position in the Line of Succession to the Belgian throne: 1

Education: Princess Élisabeth attends school at Sint-Jan Berchmanscollege in Marolles, Brussels

Links:

Unofficial Royalty: Princess Elisabeth of Belgium, Duchess of Brabant

Belgian Monarchy: Princess Elisabeth, Duchess of Brabant

Wikipedia: Princess Elisabeth, Duchess of Brabant

Prince Gabriel

Full Name: Gabriel Baudouin Charles Marie

Title: His Royal Highness Prince Gabriel of Belgium

Born: August 20, 2003 at the Erasmus Hospital in Anderlecht, Brussels

Parents: King Philippe of the Belgians and Mathilde d’Udekem d’Acoz

Position in the Line of Succession to the Belgian throne: 2

Education: Prince Gabriel attends school at Sint-Jan Berchmanscollege in Marolles, Brussels

Links:

Unofficial Royalty: Prince Gabriel of Belgium

Belgian Monarchy: Prince Gabriel

Wikipedia: Prince Gabriel of Belgium

Prince Emmanuel

Full Name: Emmanuel Léopold Guillaume François Marie

Title: His Royal Highness Prince Emmanuel of Belgium

Born: October 4, 2005 at the Erasmus Hospital in Anderlecht, Brussels

Parents: King Philippe of the Belgians and Mathilde d’Udekem d’Acoz

Position in the Line of Succession to the Belgian throne: 3

Education: Prince Emmanuel attends the Eureka school in Kessel-Lo

Links:

Unofficial Royalty: Prince Emmanuel of Belgium

Belgian Monarchy: Prince Emmanuel

WIkipedia: Prince Emmanuel of Belgium

Princess Eléonore

Full Name: Eléonore Fabiola Victoria Anne Marie

Title: Her Royal Highness Princess Eléonore of Belgium

Born: April 16, 2008 at the Erasmus Hospital in Anderlecht, Brussels

Parents: King Philippe of the Belgians and Mathilde d’Udekem d’Acoz

Position in the Line of Succession to the Belgian throne: 4

Education: Princess Eléonore attends school at Sint-Jan Berchmanscollege in Marolles, Brussels

Links:

Unofficial Royalty: Princess Eléonore of Belgium

Belgian Monarchy: Princess Eléonore

Wikipedia: Princess Eléonore of Belgium

Princess Astrid, Archduchess of Austria-Este

Full Name: Astrid Joséphine-Charlotte Fabrizia Elisabeth Paola Marie

Title: Her Imperial and Royal Highness Princess Astrid of Belgium, Archduchess of Austria-Este

Born: June 5, 1962 at Château de Belvédère in Laeken, Belgium

Parents: King Albert II of the Belgians and Paola Ruffo di Calabria

Position in the Line of Succession to the Belgian throne: 5

Married: Archduke Lorenz of Austria-Este on September 22, 1984 in Brussels, Belgium

Children:

-Prince Amadeo, born February 21, 1986

-Princess Maria Laura, born August 26, 1988

-Prince Joachim born October 4, 1991

-Princess Luisa Maria, born October 11, 1995

-Princess Laetitia Maria, born April 23, 2003

Education:

– Secondary school in Brussels, Belgium

– Art History at Leiden, Netherlands

– Institute of European Studies, Geneva Switzerland

Links:

Unofficial Royalty: Princess Astrid of Belgium, Archduchess of Austria-Este

Belgian Monarchy: Princess Astrid

Wikipedia: Princess Astrid, Archduchess of Austria-Este

Prince Lorenz, Archduke of Austria-Este

Full Name: Lorenz Otto Carl Amadeus Thadeus Maria Pius Andreas Marcus d’Aviano

Title: His Imperial and Royal Highness Prince Lorenz of Belgium, Archduke of Austria-Este, Prince Imperial of Austria, Prince Royal of Hungary

Born: December 16, 1955 at Clinique du Belvédère, Boulogne-Billancourt, Hauts-de-Seine, France

Parents: Robert, Archduke of Austria-Este and Princess Margherita of Savoy-Aosta

Married: Princess Astrid of Belgium on September 22, 1984 in Brussels, Belgium

Children:

-Prince Amadeo, born February 21, 1986

-Princess Maria Laura, born August 26, 1988

-Prince Joachim born October 4, 1991

-Princess Luisa Maria, born October 11, 1995

-Princess Laetitia Maria, born April 23, 2003

Education:

– Secondary school in France

– Studied Economics at University of St Gallen, Switzerland

– Economics and Social Science, University of Innsbruck, Austria

Links:

Unofficial Royalty: Prince Lorenz of Belgium, Archduke of Austria-Este

Wikipedia: Prince Lorenz of Belgium, Archduke of Austria-Este

Prince Laurent

Full Name: Laurent Benoît Baudouin Marie

Title: His Royal Highness Prince Laurent of Belgium

Born: October 19, 1963 at Château de Belvédère in Laeken, Belgium

Parents: King Albert II of the Belgians and Paola Ruffo di Calabria

Position in the Line of Succession to the Belgian throne: 11

Married: Claire Louise Coombs on April 12, 2003 in Brussels, Belgium

Children:

-Princess Louise, born February 6, 2004

-Prince Nicolas, born December 13, 2005

-Prince Aymeric, born December 13, 2005

Links:

Unofficial Royalty: Prince Laurent of Belgium

Belgian Monarchy: Prince Laurent

Wikipedia: Prince Laurent of Belgium

Princess Claire

Full Name: Claire Louise Coombs

Title: Her Royal Highness Princess Claire of Belgium

Born: January 18, 1974 in Bath, England

Parents: Nicholas Coombs and Nicole Mertens

Married: Prince Laurent of Belgium on April 12, 2003 in Brussels, Belgium

Children:

-Princess Louise, born February 6, 2004

-Prince Nicolas, born December 13, 2005

-Prince Aymeric, born December 13, 2005
